title: School and community: getting into the act
creator_credit: Ron V. Brown and R and R Productions
brief_description: Shows how communication between school councils and the school communities can benefit both bodies. Community education activities are shown which help to integrate the school and the outside community. Discusses the role of the school council in the provision of community education facilities and covers issues such as the composition of the council, evaluation of the council and the council as employer.
